Quilava (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0155: Cyndaquil
Pokémon
#0157: Typhlosion →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Quilava (TCG Pocket).

Quilava has been featured on 15 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Quilava cards are normally Fire-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Quilava

Quilava
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
